pages.text: Eli and the Flying Red Hat

Wooooooosh!

The strong wind blew Auntie Antelope's red hat!

 "Help me catch my hat. My red hat!" she cried.
%s, can you tell me a time when you were active with your %s?
pages.subtext: Active means any things you do that makes you sweat or out of breath. For example: running, playing in the park, dancing, or swimming.

pages.text: What do you like when you were active with your %s?
Thinking about the fun things of physical activity can make it more enjoyable!
Do you want know what' going to happen next?
pages.subtext: To read the rest of the story you and your %s have to complete a one-week challenge.
